package_manager_conflict.issue: Both npm and pnpm lock files present
package_manager_conflict.recommendation: Choose one package manager and remove the other lock file

extracted_codebase_files.issue: Full codebase extractions committed to repository
extracted_codebase_files.recommendation: Remove immediately - these are development artifacts

redundant_extract_scripts.issue: Multiple scripts for extracting codebase content
redundant_extract_scripts.recommendation: Consolidate or move to scripts/ directory

redundant_setup_documentation.recommendation: Consolidate into single comprehensive setup guide

redundant_triple_system_docs.issue: Multiple overlapping Triple System documentation files
redundant_triple_system_docs.recommendation: Keep main guide and index, consolidate others

redundant_frd_files.issue: Same Functional Requirements Document in both MD and PDF formats
redundant_frd_files.recommendation: Keep one format (prefer MD for version control)
